text: Hi, when we checked the loading speed of our website, we reached a very high figure of 2.07 seconds in the top section, as shown in the screenshot. We want to know the cause of this and how we can resolve it. Has anyone encountered a problem like this before?

For what it is worth, you may want to optimize some of the imagery on the page. You have PNG files that are 300-400kb. If you optimized them for web (or maybe made them JPG) you could cut down on the file sizes.

Services like <https://tinypng.com/> and others could help in reducing file size for potentially faster loading times.
